item.title: Weekly Review #56 - Meeting Randy and Taking the Driver's Test
item.description: 'Fix You - Coldplay' Preface This piece is a record and reflection of my life from March 25, 2024 to March 31, 2024. The happiest event this week was meeting Randy. My fan dream came true, and we had a delightful conversation. To avoid impacting work, I woke up at 5 AM for four or five consecutive days to practice driving at the school. It was tough, but I passed the second stage of the driver’s test in one go - worth it.
